pr_title: QuarkusSecurityTestExtension fails to read class annotation

timeline.bodyText: Is this while loop missing an assignment to testSecurity? In other words, should that testSecurity = original.getAnnotation(TestSecurity.class) be moved into the while loop?
timeline.author: jaikiran

replies.bodyText: Ah, oops. It still fixes it in this specific case as it is checking the original, however this was supposed to make it work for superclasses as well.
replies.author: stuartwdouglas
